"Create a Chatterbox Account 
" "To sign up for Chatterbox, create a Chatterbox Account. You can use the username and password to sign in to Chatterbox 1. Go to the Chatterbox Account creation page. 2. Follow the steps on the screen to set up your account. 3. Use the account you created to sign in to Chatterbox

"
"Create a strong password and a more secure account 
" "A secure password and updated recovery info help protect your Chatterbox Account.
 Create a strong password
 A strong password helps you: Keep your personal info safe; Protect your emails, files, and other content; Prevent someone else from getting in to your account Meet password requirements Create your password using 8 characters or more. It can be any combination of letters, numbers, and symbols (ASCII characters). You can't use a password that: Is particularly weak. Example: "password123"; You've used before on your account; Starts or ends with a blank space
 Follow tips for a good password A strong password can be memorable to you but nearly impossible for someone else to guess. Learn what makes a good password, then follow these tips to create your own.

"Privacy Policy

"St. Charles Community College’s Commitment to Privacy St. Charles Community College (SCC) respects your privacy. We are providing this privacy statement to inform you about what information is collected when you visit www.stchas.edu and how that information is used. The privacy statements described here do NOT apply to any external sites hosted by SCC or others. When you use our services, you’re trusting us with your information. We understand this is a big responsibility and work hard to protect your information and put you in control. This Privacy Policy is meant to help you understand what information we collect, why we collect it, and how you can update, manage, export, and delete your information. Effective July 22, 2019
